en-US.closeDocumentWarning: Are you sure you want to close "{document}" ? If you have pending changes these will be lost.
en-US.errorLoadingFile: An error occured during the loading of "{file}"
en-US.warningUnload: You are about to close BitMappery. Confirmation means you have either saved your pending changes or are aware these will otherwise be lost.

cloud.connectionExplDropbox:
In order to import files from or save projects to Dropbox you must first connect to Dropbox and grant BitMappery read and write permission. Dropbox connects directly to your machine without middleware, keeping your data private at all times.

For more information, consult the privacy policy.
cloud.connectionExplDrive:
In order to import files from or save projects to Google Drive you must first connect to Google Drive and grant BitMappery read and write permission.

Drive operates under stricter restrictions than Dropbox, it is not possible to access just any file or folder in your Google Drive, only those created by the BitMappery app.

Google Drive connects directly to your machine without any middleware, keeping your data and file access private at all times. For more information, consult the privacy policy.
cloud.errorLoadingDrive: An unknown error has occurred while loading the Google Drive API
cloud.notAllPermissionsGrantedDrive: Not all required read and write permissions were granted. Without these BitMappery cannot use Google Drive. If this was by mistake, reconnect and tick the appropriate permission box.
